name: Administratum Nexus
effect_text: Before the battle begins, the controlling player gains +1 Command Point. Command Points gained this way may exceed normal starting limits.

name: Fortress Complex
effect_text: Select one Battleline unit in your army. That unit gains +1 to its Armor Save while wholly within your deployment zone (subject to normal save-mod limits).

name: Manufactorum Node
limits: controlled; active if selected; once per battle
effect_text: Once per battle, one unit may add +1 Strength to one of its weapon profiles for a single Shooting or Fight phase. Declare use before making any attack rolls for that phase.

name: Hive Ruins
effect_text: Units from the controlling army may Advance and Charge during this battle (unless restricted by their datasheets).

name: Void Port
effect_text: Before the battle, select one unit in your army. That unit gains the Deep Strike ability for this battle.

name: Medicae Facility
effect_text: Once per campaign round, the controlling faction may negate the effects of one Out-of-Action roll made for a unit from that faction (treat as if the OoA result did not apply).
